FAQ:

Q: Do you offer cPanel, Plesk, Fantastico, RVSkins and other hosting control panels and auto-installers?
A: Yes. We offer a lot hosting software like control panels (cPanel, Plesk, DirectAdmin, InterWorx, ISPManager, Kloxo, Webmin), sitebuiders (RVSiteBuilder, Trendy Flash Builder), auto-installers (Softaculous, Fantastico).

Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: We accept PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards, AlertPay (Payza), Skrill (MoneyBookers), Liberty Reserve, WU/MG

Q: What is your average setup time?
A: All VPSes are setup instantly so you do not need to wait.

Q: How long have you been in business?
A: Since 2004, registered company in Bulgaria (EU).

Q: Do you allow adult content?
A: Yes, we allow legal adult content on our servers in UK and USA (Germany is not Adult friendly).

Q: Do you allow VPN & proxies on your server?
A: Yes, you we allow VPN & private proxies on our servers.

Q: Can we setup VPN with our VPS server?
A: Yes all servers have OpenVPN and PPTP support.

Q: Do you offer Reverse-DNS (RDNS)?
A: Yes you can modify the RDNS for your IP address/es via control panel.
